Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 113-275, Scrapbook of Faulds Fingerprint Notes (includes publication and manuscript items.)Page 46; no title; Handwritten notes quoting page 693 of Nature magazine from February 19, 1914, which mentions Faulds and Herschel's fingerprint discoveries/ debate.
